document_data.name: Antone Corluk
document_data.mainbody: '''Antone Corluk''' was a footman under the command of [[Oriphaun Huntsilver]] of House [[Huntsilver]] from the town of [[Eveningstar]] in [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Antone was a [[human]] soldier with stern demeanor and chestnut hair.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, Antone Corluk asked a band of [[adventurer]]s from the world of [[Eberron]], who were transported to [[Toril]] by a rift, to lend a hand to his master, nobleman adventurer and relic collector Oriphaun Huntsilver, who found himself at the heart of a plot to attack the city of [[Wheloon]] by the shadow forces of the [[Returned Netheril]].
